package.name: Mineland灵动岛调整-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Lower your Dynamic Island and make it disappear if you don't need it. All the original code is from KhanhDuyTran (@TranKha50277352)仅支持iOS16系统，配合DynamicCow开启灵动岛，对灵动岛进行调整，如透明度或者位置，大家自行体验，灵动半岛估计不行，自行测试！
